m_szDocSumamry: Year of publication: Keyword(s): Home » Library » Life-cycle greenhouse gas emissions of transportation fuels: issues and implications for unconventional fuel sources » Library publication Life-cycle greenhouse gas emissions of transportation fuels: issues and implications for unconventional fuel sources June 2011 The effectiveness and efficiency of regulatory and other policy approaches intended to reduce the greenhouse gas emissions from transportation fuels can hinge on the fuel life-cycle analysis (LCA). This report provides a summary of the workshop of the same name, convened in September
